item.title: Notes on Hierarchical Hilbert Space Gaussian Processes
item.description: In this notebook, we want to explore some ideas on hierarchical Hilbert Space Gaussian Processes following the fantastic exposition of the PyMC example notebook: “Gaussian Processes: HSGP Advanced Usage” by Bill Engels, Alexandre Andorra and Maxim Kochurov. I can only recommend to read the notebook and the references therein! For an introduction to Hilbert Space Gaussian Processes, please see my introductory blog post: “A Conceptual and Practical Introduction to Hilbert Space GPs Approximation Methods”.
